title: Winston-Salem State University Official Est. Date Unisex Adult Pull-Over Hoodie ,Red, 2X-Large
features: A FAN FAVORITE - This unisex adult collegiate hoodie looks stylish on both men and women and is great for easy, everyday wear.

IT'S ALL IN THE DETAILS - Featuring reinforced stitching at the neck and hemline, and high quality fabrication, our classic university sweatshirt is casual at its most versatile. Dress it down on gym days with your favorite sweats, or layer it up for a night out with friends—we've got you covered.

OFFICIALLY LICENSED - All of our merchandise is officially licensed and 100% authentic. Our school-centric imagery is created by our brilliant in-house team of graphic artists, and is often hand-drawn and illustrated, adding unique detailing to each design.

WASH & WEAR - No high maintenance care instructions here. Just toss this little beauty in the washer on cold and tumble or hang dry. Love this design and want to see more of it? Check out our other merch to view this on alternate body styles!

THE PERFECT FAN GIFT - Our graphic tops are perfect for giveaways, game days, birthday presents, graduation, back-to-school, tailgating, Christmas & holiday gifts, swag goodie bags, or just treating yourself!
description: Winston-Salem State University Official Est. Date Unisex Adult Pull-Over Hoodie
